name: Tough Commerce
headline: Shopify for construction.
description: Tough Commerce is the only white-label commerce platform tailored for industry-specific workflows and enable merchants, suppliers, producers and manufacturers to digitize their processes. Behind the scenes, we  provides order management, location management, pricing management,  dispatching, logistics, messaging, e-ticketing, invoicing, customer portal, AR automation, payment, payouts and real-time delivery capabilities through driver app. With financial and operational ERP integrations, our technology can operate stand-alone or seamlessly alongside deeply integrated products.

founders.name: Jordan Latourelle
founders.description:
Jordan is the founder and vice-chair of Tough Commerce (YC W20) and now the Founder and CEO at StrongForce AI. 
‍

# One platform to connect your people, systems, and data.
# Lightening the load on job management.
Tough Commerce empowers asset-based construction businesses to optimize job management with automated scheduling, operator tracking, streamlined invoicing, and real-time analytics, all through a centralized platform designed to enhance operational efficiency.
​
[View the Platform](http://www.toughcommerce.com/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/jalib/tough-commerce-demo?uuid=6448a148-9955-4b88-b1ed-138e63572239>)

# See it in action...
Solutions
## Streamline your operations from quote to cash, all in one place.
## A modern job management solution—built to make tough jobs easy.
![volumetric_concrete_dispatch_tough_commerce](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/10638b_92412c25f8ef414bb5631ea15d844175~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_53,h_26,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/volumetric_concrete_dispatch_tough_commerce.png)
# Streamline communication and minimize unnecessary calls
## Seamlessly Schedule & Dispatch Jobs in Minutes
Stop using Google Calendar for scheduling and WhatsApp for dispatching. Schedule your operators and assets with ease using our drag-and-drop calendar feature, and optimize both in a platform designed specifically for construction. Dispatch your operators at any time.
[Learn More](http://www.toughcommerce.com/<https:/www.toughcommerce.com/dispatch>)
# Maximize revenue with dynamic invoicing
## Real-Time Invoice Updates at Every Stage of the Job
## Ensure your invoice is updated in real-time as changes are made on the jobsite, guaranteeing you’re paid for all of the work that you deliver — all with complete accuracy.
[Learn More](http://www.toughcommerce.com/<https:/www.toughcommerce.com/get-paid>)
![Invoice Mockup #6 by _moqop \(2\).png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/10638b_892542fd0b2644de9da2a7b3164dd29e~mv2.png/v1/crop/x_0,y_171,w_595,h_545/fill/w_67,h_62,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/Invoice%20Mockup%20%236%20by%20_moqop%20\(2\).png)
![Payment solution and AR tool for ready-mix concrete, bulk materials, volumetric, pumping, building materials](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/10638b_37e65492f6d84bc59e90777c88b212fa~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_190,h_213,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_3,enc_avif,quality_auto/Group%208703.png)
![Apple Set.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/71f8c5_4e7bebb504af4d0a97150ba7505b7587~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_104,h_78,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/Apple%20Set.png)
# Save time with dynamic, smart pricing
Use Smart Pricing to Customize Rates However You Want
## Smart pricing lets you customize product pricing by job type, order size, specific customers, and more without having to manually adjust invoices. Automatically factor in travel time, wait times, COD orders or government jobs, all tailored to your needs.
[Learn More](http://www.toughcommerce.com/<https:/www.toughcommerce.com/back-office>)
# Cut down on your order desk and free up resources
Empower Your Contractors to Submit Orders Anytime, Anywhere
## The Contractor App, branded with your colors and logo, empowers your contractors to submit orders directly through the app. Once an order is placed, it’s pushed into the Tough Commerce platform, with contractors receiving real-time updates and automatic notifications.
[Learn More](http://www.toughcommerce.com/<https:/www.toughcommerce.com/customer-portal>)
![Group 8702 \(1\).png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/10638b_439a5abd06c842688d44e745735b604c~mv2.png/v1/crop/x_0,y_0,w_638,h_567/fill/w_88,h_78,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/Group%208702%20\(1\).png)
![macbook-pro-mockup-floating-over-a-transparent-background-a11409 \(1\).png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/61373a_4ed48f4872084511a2b60012cf21a72f~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_121,h_91,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/macbook-pro-mockup-floating-over-a-transparent-background-a11409%20\(1\).png)
# Make better decisions & gain additional visibility
Identify Trends and Make Data Driven Decisions with Job Insights
## Get reports and analytics on your business for powerful insights and visibility, with data broken down by operators, customers, project types, and more. This breakdown helps you identify trends, optimize resources, and make proactive decisions to boost performance.
[View the Platform](http://www.toughcommerce.com/<https:/meetings.hubspot.com/jalib/tough-commerce-demo?uuid=6448a148-9955-4b88-b1ed-138e63572239>)
Industries
![mockup-of-an-imac-placed-on-a-colorful-background-m33284.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/61373a_2ae96227edd14e2288f44b592262fc81~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_60,h_45,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/mockup-of-an-imac-placed-on-a-colorful-background-m33284.png)
## Start dispatching within 24 hours.
### Skip the long setup times, complex configurations, and days of training sessions. Our easy-to-use platform, backed by top-notch customer service, enables you to start dispatching jobs to your operators fast.
Testamonials
> "They are revolutionizing business for suppliers in the construction industry"
Colin B. Dunnigan, President

## Go digital with Tough Commerce. 
[](http://www.toughcommerce.com/<https:/www.toughcommerce.com/toughcommerce-cloudbaseddispatching>)

generated_description:
**Tough Commerce: Empowering the Construction Industry through Digital Innovation**

Founded in 2017 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W20, Tough Commerce is on a mission to become the Shopify for construction. With its headquarters in Toronto, Canada, the company supports asset-based construction businesses with a comprehensive, white-label commerce platform specifically designed for industry workflows. Operating with a lean team of 21, Tough Commerce offers a range of tools that help streamline processes in what can often be a chaotic field.

At its core, Tough Commerce provides robust functionalities including order management, location management, dynamic pricing, dispatching, logistics, messaging, e-ticketing, customer invoicing, and even real-time delivery capabilities through a dedicated driver app. This suite of tools allows merchants, suppliers, and manufacturers in the construction sector to digitize their operations seamlessly. 

The platform aims to lighten the load on job management by integrating financial and operational ERP capabilities, making Tough Commerce a flexible option that can function independently or work in tandem with existing systems. This adaptability is particularly beneficial for construction businesses looking to optimize their operations without overhauling their entire infrastructure.

Their user-friendly interface is designed to eliminate inefficiencies—no more juggling between multiple software for scheduling jobs or communicating with team members. With features like a drag-and-drop calendar for scheduling and real-time invoice updates, Tough Commerce ensures that businesses can manage jobs more efficiently from quote to cash.

Tough Commerce specifically caters to industries such as volumetric concrete, concrete pumping, and hydrovac excavation. Their commitment is evident in their use cases, which encompass everything from dispatching workers to streamlining invoicing, aiming to maximize revenue while minimizing administrative burdens.

With endorsements from leaders in the construction space, Tough Commerce is quickly establishing itself as a trusted partner for top North American companies. They are consistently featured in tech publications, reflecting their innovative approach to tackling operational challenges within the construction industry.

So, if you're in the construction business and are ready to make the leap into the digital age, Tough Commerce positions itself as an accessible, straightforward solution designed precisely for you. You can explore more by visiting their [website](http://www.toughcommerce.com).
